It all begins with an idea.

My journey started as a professional dancer, training at Laine Theatre Arts School London. This lead to performing onboard a range of Australia cruise ships, travelling all over the world. I was the dance captain/cast manager. I loved my time onboard but was ready for a change. After this, I wanted to pursue my love for fitness and well-being and have been able to turn my love for pilates into a profession. From qualifying as a Pilates Instructor I have created my own business called Black Rock Pilates&Yoga. I used the last year to really push my business online. From that, I have connected with so many amazing people around the world who have joined in on my online classes. Iâ€™m proud that I took the leap to do my training as it has been life-changing. Now I run my business in the New Forest area teaching weekly group and private classes. I hope to one day organise a wellness retreat abroad, continue to grow my brand and help as many people along their pilates or yoga journey whether they are complete beginners or have been doing for years.
